00023 namespace DL 
00024   {
00028   template < class ReturnType , 
00029        class Param1     ,
00030        class Param2     
00031      >
00032   class Functor2 : public DelegateBase 
00033   {
00034   ReturnType (*m_function)(Param1,Param2);
00035   Param1 m_val1;
00036   Param2 m_val2;
00037   Functor2(){}
00038   public:
00039   Functor2(ReturnType (*function)(Param1,Param2),
00040     Param1 val1 = Param1(),
00041     Param2 val2 = Param2()):
00042     m_function(function),
00043     m_val1(val1),m_val2(val2)
00044     {}
00045   virtual ~Functor2(){}
00046   void operator()()
00047   {
00048     (*m_function)(m_val1,m_val2);
00049   }
00050   ReturnType operator()(Param1 val1,Param2 val2)
00051   {
00052    return (*m_function)(val1,val2);
00053   }
00054   void Invoke()
00055   {
00056     (*m_function)(m_val1,m_val2);
00057   }
00058   ReturnType Invoke(Param1 val1,Param2 val2)
00059   {
00060    return (*m_function)(val1,val2);
00061   }
00062   };
00063   
00064   //######################################################################################################
00065   template < class ReturnType , class Param1    , 
00066              class Param2     
00067      >
00068   DelegateObj create_delegate( ReturnType(*Meth)(Param1,Param2), 
00069                 Param1 & param1 , Param2 & param2 )
00070   {
00071   return DelegateObj(new Functor2<ReturnType,Param1,Param2>
00072     (Meth,param1,param2));
00073   }
